title: can i get few RP by sending a ticket to RIOT ?
body:
hey guys !! 
can i actually ask from riot to give me 20 RP so i can combine them with the 105 RP i have to buy a key and open up a chest ? 
yeah guys really it's only 20 RP :/ (i don't have a credit card)

replies.body: We might be able to work something out for you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll see what we can do!
